templates.title: Nestor — App Landing Page
templates.description: Nestor is a playful/minimalistic app landing page template built for startups and app makers.
templates.longDescription: Nestor is a playful/minimalistic app landing page template built for startups and app makers. It’s extremely easy to customize and was developed with the best SEO & accessiblity practices in mind.
